notes.text: sap.ui.integration.cards.AdaptiveContent: Style property for actions enabled
Integration Cards: High CPU utilization is now fixed
sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Markdown support for Adaptive type updated
sap.ui.integration.cards.CalendarContent: Now works with no initial date
sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Templating support for Adaptive type updated
sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Payload of submit action handler now supports bindings
sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Object card is enhanced with new experimental item types
CalendarCard: Appointments times and card display match
